Job Title: Project Superintendent (Multifamily Construction)

Location: Charlotte, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
INTRODUCTION 

EMBREY is a long-established diversified real estate investment company with a focus in multifamily. We are seeking an exceptional Project Superintendent to join our purpose-driven team to oversee dynamic and unique construction projects.

As the Project Superintendent, you will be responsible for overseeing and managing all aspects of the construction projects. You will work closely with project teams and subcontractors to ensure the successful execution of projects while maintaining high safety and quality standards.

Candidates with a blend of talent, leadership, and dedication will be considered for this opportunity.  Our ideal candidate is driven to excel and constantly striving for remarkable results through a commitment to excellence. We value individuals who embrace challenges, pay attention to details, always do the right thing, and thrive in a fast-paced and team-oriented environment. 

Apply now if you have a proven track record of leading and supervising on-site construction teams and subcontractors, developing project schedules, and enforcing quality control standards according to project specifications.

About Embrey

The Corporate Headquarters is located in San Antonio, and we have active projects in 8 cities across 6 states: Arizona, Colorado, Texas, Tennessee, North Carolina, and Florida. We currently manage 11,000 units and have 6,000 units under construction. In 2024, our 50 th year in business, we will have developed 50,000 total units.

We value our team as our greatest asset. We always do the right thing. We are honest and responsible. Details matter. Join us to contribute to exceptional results!

POSITION OBJECTIVE 

Lead and Inspire: As a Project Superintendent, your primary objective will be to ensure the successful, timely, and high-quality completion of construction projects.

Champion of Schedule and Quality: Ensuring our projects are completed on schedule while prioritizing safety and quality.

Key Qualifications And Success Factors

Proven Track Record: 5-8 years of experience as a multifamily or wood frame construction superintendent. Technical Expertise: Your proficiency with Procore, MS Project, and Microsoft Office Suite enables you to navigate projects with agility and precision. Project Work: Must demonstrate an exemplary history of consistently completing projects on schedule and fostering collaborative efforts with project managers, construction teams, and subcontractors. 

EDUCATION

A bachelor's degree in Construction Science/Management, Engineering, or a related field is preferred.

WHY CHOOSE EMBREY

EMBREY believes our people are our most important investment, and we have a long-term strategy to ensure our culture remains strong. EMBREY gives back to each of our markets and also provides our team members with paid community service hours. We were recently named as one of the Best Places to Work by the San Antonio Business Journal.

Enjoy the perks of a salaried/exempt position with competitive pay and bonus. We have an extensive benefits package, including healthcare (medical, vision, dental), wellness activities, short and long-term disability, life and AD&D, parental leave, Paid Time Off, and a 401(k) match.

EEOC STATEMENT

We are an equal-opportunity employer and value diversity and inclusion in our workforce. We do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, or any other protected status.  Our commitment is to provide a fair and inclusive hiring process.  All employment is decided based on qualifications, merit, and business needs.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
